summary: Feature request to add default WorkflowOptions to WorkflowClient constructor, allowing users to specify task queue and other options once instead of repeatedly when creating workflow handles.
userImpact: Reduces boilerplate code by allowing users to set common workflow options once at client creation instead of repeating them for each handle creation.
proposedFix: Add a `defaults` or `workflowDefaults` attribute to `WorkflowClientOptions` interface containing default `WorkflowOptions` for new handles, making `createWorkflowHandle`'s options parameter optional.
resolutionDetails: WorkflowClient now has a `workflowDefaults` option that allows users to set default workflow options at client creation time.
keyQuote: It would be nice to provide the task queue once on `WorkflowClient` creation instead of every time when a WorkflowHandle is created.
